title: FDA 'playing with fire' as it looks to fast-track COVID-19 vaccine, experts warn
author: Leandra Bernstein
description: The Food and Drug Administration could greenlight a coronavirus vaccine sooner than many thought possible. Yet, even if a safe, effective vaccine was available before the end of the year there are concerns that political pressure could undermine public confidence in it. Over the weekend, Commissioner of the U. S. Food and Drug Administration Dr.
cleaned_text: FDA 'playing with fire' as it looks to fast-track COVID-19 vaccine, experts warn by Leandra Bernstein President Donald Trump listens as Dr. Stephen Hahn, commissioner of the U.S. Food and Drug Administration, speaks during a media briefing in the James Brady Briefing Room of the White House, Sunday, Aug. 23, 2020, in Washington.(AP Photo/Alex Brandon)
